title: Options Schema
description: Schema for options.json files containing unit/model customization options

Type.description: Type of option - determines how it affects units/models (0=SwapUnit, 1=ModifyItemOnAll, 2=ModifyItemOnBasic, 3=SwapBasic, 4=ModifyItemOnSingle, 5=SwapSingle, 6=AddSingle, 7=AddExtras)

ItemsToAdd.description: Object mapping item IDs to add (statlines, rules, equipment)

ExtraItems.description: List of extra items (cards, units, etc.) associated with this option

Id.description: ID of the extra item. Just deployable items like cards, tokens, cardstacks or units for now, but could be extended to other types if needed
